OOC: First group to approach this one will gain a loyal addition.

::Lambda::
    Her stasis pod landed in South America.  It was an uneventful landing and 
all the systems were still working.  The only unusual thing was that it 
landed in a field of living llamas.  It didn't crush them or anything, they 
were just there.  The bot inside the pod had been altered as it was now 
transmetal.  With all of these llamas around it is no surprise that it's 
beast mode was that of a llama.
